Artificial Intelligence predicts whether or not antidepressants will "work" on someone###1###EL_023###[Achievement attained]###[Achievement]###[attained]
Artificial intelligence may soon play a key role in the treatment of depression
column2: as a new 'smart' system developed by scientists in the US is the first in the world that can predict with great accuracy whether or not a patient will respond to antidepressants
column3: in which case they should seek alternatives such as psychotherapy.###2###EL_023###[Achievement attained

column1: The computer - with the help of an appropriate machine learning algorithm that analyses the activity in the brain scans of a person with depression (particularly the so-called "alpha waves") - is able to predict the effectiveness of drug treatment.###3###EL_023###[Achievement attained]###[Achievement]###[attained]
The use of antidepressants has increased dramatically internationally over the last decades
column2: but the drugs do not work for many patients.###4###EL_023###[Achievement constrained]###[Achievement]###[constrained]

column1: Many patients do not respond to antidepressants at all
column2: while others experience side effects and even a worsening of their condition.###5###EL_023###[Security: personal constrained]###[Security: personal]###[constrained]

column1: Only about a third of patients (around 30%) react positively to the first antidepressant and experience a relatively rapid remission of their symptoms.###6###EL_023###[Security: personal constrained]###[Security: personal]###[constrained]

The "smart" SELSER computer system - developed with funding from the US National Institute of Mental Health - successfully predicted which patients would benefit from antidepressants within the next two months and which would not.###11###EL_023###[Achievement attained]###[Achievement]###[attained]
These findings were subsequently confirmed in three other groups of patients.###12###EL_023###[Achievement attained]###[Achievement]###[attained]
The next steps
column2: according to the researchers
column3: will be to complete a larger study that will definitively confirm the reliability of the new technique and eventually seek approval from the US Food and Drug Administration (FDA) for their innovative method and the development of an artificial intelligence interface that will be integrated into the brain scan machines.###13###EL_023###[Stimulation attained]###[Stimulation]###[attained]

column1: This will allow a more personalised treatment of depression in the future.###14###EL_023###[Security: personal attained

column1: On September 15, 2019, the new law entered into force, which anchors and regulates in law the new bankruptcy procedures, which are now known as "insolvency and financial rehabilitation procedures".###2###HE_061###[Conformity: rules attained]###[Conformity: rules]###[attained]
Among the stated goals of the new law are prioritizing the financial rehabilitation of the debtors

column1: In cases where the amount of debts accumulates and exceeds NIS 150,000, the party responsible for handling these cases on behalf of the state is the "Commissioner for Insolvency and Economic Rehabilitation Procedures" (also known as the "Official Collector" in the bankruptcy procedures that were opened before the law came into effect).###4###HE_061###[Conformity: rules attained

column1: Another change that is on the agenda is expected to strengthen parliamentary oversight of the most offensive restrictions on human rights - restrictions on activity in private space
column2: such as limiting the number of passengers in a car
column3: and restrictions on activity in public space
column4: such as a ban on staying in parks or on beaches.###8###HE_067###[Self-direction: action attained

column1: The memorandum states that these instructions will be limited to a period of 14 days
column2: but the government can extend it at any time.###9###HE_067###[Conformity: rules attained
column3: Conformity: rules constrained]###[Conformity: rules

column1: The change being considered is that after a certain period
column2: a committee of the Knesset will have to approve the extension of the ban in advance
column3: and will not only be able to cancel it retroactively.###10###HE_067###[Conformity: rules attained

column1: The Corona Law Memorandum published last Thursday was formulated in accordance with the position of Attorney General Avichai Mandelblit
column2: and the comments of High Court judges
column3: who urged the government to stop the extensive use of emergency regulations
column4: and replace them with legislation.###11###HE_067###[Self-direction: action constrained]###[Self-direction: action]###[constrained]

column1: Almost all of the restrictions imposed by the government on the public in recent months as part of the fight against Corona - such as restrictions on leaving homes or opening businesses - were imposed through emergency regulations
column2: which are not subject to parliamentary oversight and are limited to three months.###12###HE_067###[Conformity: rules attained
column3: Conformity: rules constrained]###[Conformity: rules

column1: With the expiration of some of the emergency regulations approaching
column2: it was decided to draw up a memorandum of law that would authorize the government to act in the event of another outbreak.###13###HE_067###[Conformity: rules attained]###[Conformity: rules]###[attained]

column1: Officials from the relevant government ministries participated in the process, including the Ministry of Health, the Prime Minister's Office and the Department of Counseling and Legislation at the Ministry of Justice.###14###HE_067###[Conformity: rules attained]###[Conformity: rules]###[attained]

The Ministry of Health officials believed that the law should give the government a very general authorization for actions that will be necessary to deal with the crisis, similar to the government's authority to establish emergency regulations.###15###HE_067###[Power: dominance attained]###[Power: dominance]###[attained]
In the end
column2: a wording was drawn up that authorizes the government to impose restrictions in predetermined areas
column3: in accordance with the restrictions already imposed in recent months: in the private space
column9: as well as the authority to impose a closure on a certain area.###16###HE_067###[Power: dominance attained

column1: The memorandum states that in order to impose restrictions the government will have to declare a state of emergency that will be limited to 45 days
column2: on the recommendation of the Minister of Health
column3: and that the Knesset will be able to cancel the declaration.###17###HE_067###[Conformity: rules attained]###[Conformity: rules]###[attained]

column1: In addition
column2: it was determined that each limitation would be placed on the table of a committee of the Knesset
column3: which could cancel it - but it could only do so retrospectively
column4: and the limitations would not need the approval of the Knesset to enter into force.###18###HE_067###[Conformity: rules attained]###[Conformity: rules]###[attained]

column1: The memorandum of the law attracted a lot of public criticism - both for the fact that only a few days were given to receive public comments
column2: most of them during Shavuot and the weekend
column3: and for the powers that the law gives to the government.###19###HE_067###[Self-direction: thought attained

column1: Thus, one of the sections that received the most criticism is the government's authorization to determine that violating the restrictions will be a criminal offense, and the authorization of police officers to enter residences without a warrant to monitor compliance with the guidelines.###20###HE_067###[Power: dominance attained]###[Power: dominance]###[attained]
This is an authority that is given to police officers in normal times only in the face of suspicion of committing a serious crime
column2: and it was included in the memorandum to allow the police officers to monitor
column3: among other things
column4: the duty of isolation.###21###HE_067###[Conformity: rules attained]###[Conformity: rules]###[attained]

column1: Report: "Israeli software was used to spy on Al Jazeera journalists"###1###HE_076###[Power: dominance attained]###[Power: dominance]###[attained]

The spy software of the Israeli NSO was used to track dozens of journalists on the Al Jazeera network and the London-based Al Araby channel.###2###HE_076###[Power: dominance attained]###[Power: dominance]###[attained]
This is what a new report by the Citizen Love Research Institute of the University of Toronto reveals.###3###HE_076###[Self-direction: thought attained]###[Self-direction: thought]###[attained]
According to the institute's researchers, the United Arab Emirates and Saudi Arabia are behind the hacks.###4###HE_076###[Power: dominance attained]###[Power: dominance]###[attained]

The investigation also revealed evidence that NSO found a way to inject its spy, Pegasus, into iPhones without the need for active user action but by exploiting weaknesses in Apple's cloud infrastructure.###5###HE_076###[Power: dominance attained]###[Power: dominance]###[attained]

Exploitation of a loophole with a similar principle in WhatsApp previously led to a lawsuit by Facebook against the Israeli company.###6###HE_076###[Power: dominance attained]###[Power: dominance]###[attained]

According to the report, NSO's Pegasus software was used to attack 36 journalists, producers, presenters and executives at Al Jazeera, the Qatari news channel considered the most popular in the Arab world.###7###HE_076###[Power: dominance attained]###[Power: dominance]###[attained]
We also monitored a female journalist on the Al Arabi channel
column2: who also has ties to Qatar.###8###HE_076###[Power: dominance attained]###[Power: dominance]###[attained]

column1: The attacks took place last July and August, and were made possible by exploiting a weakness in Apple's systems called Kismet that allows the spy to be implanted without any action on the part of the user.###9###HE_076###[Power: dominance constrained]###[Power: dominance]###[constrained]
This is in contrast to the known method of introducing Pegasus
column2: which requires the user to click on an infected link in order to infect his device with a spy.###10###HE_076###[Security: personal constrained]###[Security: personal]###[constrained]

column1: The investigation began in January 2020 following an appeal to Citizen Love by Tamir Elmisal
column2: a reporter and presenter at Al Jazeera
column3: who previously reported on sensitive issues such as the murder of Saudi journalist Jamal Khashoggi at the Saudi consulate in Istanbul.###11###HE_076###[Self-direction: thought attained]###[Self-direction: thought]###[attained]

column1: The journalist feared his phone had been hacked
column2: and with the guidance of Citizen Love investigators
column3: installed a VPN app that allowed them to monitor his internet traffic.###12###HE_076###[Security: personal attained

column1: Initially
column2: the researchers did not detect any signs that Pegasus was working on the device.###13###HE_076###[Self-direction: thought constrained]###[Self-direction: thought]###[constrained]

column1: "But on July 19, we saw that his device was suddenly communicating with a server we had previously identified as a Pegasus installation server.###14###HE_076###[Security: personal constrained]###[Security: personal]###[constrained]

This is the first step in the installation of the surveillance system," Dr. Bill Marzak, a researcher at the University of California at Berkeley and senior research fellow at Citizen Love, who led the writing of the report, along with John Scott-Railton, Nora Eljizawi, Sienna, told "Calcalist" Anastis and Ron Deibert.###15###HE_076###[Security: personal constrained]###[Security: personal]###[constrained]

"We didn't see evidence that he clicked on a link, but we did see that there was an unusual communication pattern with Apple's iCloud servers before."###16###HE_076###[Self-direction: thought attained]###[Self-direction: thought]###[attained]

"It turned out that the attack was carried out using a component related to the FaceTime and iMessage applications," the report said.###19###HE_076###[Power: dominance attained]###[Power: dominance]###[attained]
The weakness exploited by Pegasus in Apple systems is basically similar to the weakness exploited by the spy in the WhatsApp application
column2: which was exposed at the beginning of 2019 - but more sophisticated.###20###HE_076###[Power: dominance attained]###[Power: dominance]###[attained]

column1: "In the case of WhatsApp, the breach was made through an incoming call.###21###HE_076###[Security: personal constrained]###[Security: personal]###[constrained]
In this case, none of the attackers saw an incoming call or message alert on the screen," Mrzak said.###22###HE_076###[Security: personal constrained]###[Security: personal]###[constrained]
Citizen Love researchers worked with Al Jazeera's IT department and examined the network's traffic records.###23###HE_076###[Self-direction: thought attained]###[Self-direction: thought]###[attained]

"We identified 36 Al Jazeera personal phones hacked by four clusters of servers, attributable to four NSO operators," the report said.###24###HE_076###[Self-direction: thought attained]###[Self-direction: thought]###[attained]
One operator
column2: who spied on 15 phones
column3: was identified by the investigators as acting on behalf of the United Arab Emirates government
column4: and is the same person who previously spied on the journalist Ahmed Mansour from the United Arab Emirates.###25###HE_076###[Power: dominance attained]###[Power: dominance]###[attained]

column1: Another operator
column2: who spied on 18 journalists
column3: was identified as working on behalf of the Saudi government.###26###HE_076###[Power: dominance attained]###[Power: dominance]###[attained]

column1: NSO said: "The report is based on incorrect and biased speculation and lacks any factual basis.###27###HE_076###[Face constrained]###[Face]###[constrained]
We have not received the report and therefore cannot comment.###28###HE_076###[Face constrained]###[Face]###[constrained]
Although NSO is a leader in its field in the world
column2: not every event is necessarily related to us.###29###HE_076###[Achievement attained

column2: but this is really not enough: more and more evidence proves that the deadly virus survives on surfaces for days
column3: and can continue to infect

column1: Reviews in the medical literature have shown that the corona virus survives for a long time on surfaces.###3###HE_082###[Security: societal constrained]###[Security: societal]###[constrained]
One of the latest reviews showed that the virus can be detected up to three hours later in the air
column2: up to four hours on copper
column3: up to 24 hours on cardboard and up to three days on plastic and stainless steel.###4###HE_082###[Security: societal constrained]###[Security: societal]###[constrained]

column1: Similar results were obtained from tests done on the corona virus that caused the SARS outbreak in 2003.###5###HE_082###[Security: societal constrained]###[Security: societal]###[constrained]
Our cell phones can accumulate large amounts of viruses.###7###HE_082###[Security: societal constrained]###[Security: societal]###[constrained]
We take them everywhere
column2: by hand
column3: including on the street
column4: and place them on all kinds of surfaces - outside and at home.###8###HE_082###[Security: societal constrained]###[Security: societal]###[constrained]

column1: And everything is caught in them.###9###HE_082###[Security: societal constrained]###[Security: societal]###[constrained]

column1: If you walked around places where there are other people

column1: As for the method of disinfection

column1: "The working world we knew will no longer be the same"###1###HE_083###[Stimulation attained]###[Stimulation]###[attained]

Tens of thousands of patients a day did not close the schools.###1###HE_097###[Security: societal constrained]###[Security: societal]###[constrained]

Kanievsky's funeral Yes, the Ministries of Education and the Interior easily approved the closing of hundreds of educational institutions across the country due to the rabbi's funeral.###2###HE_097###[Tradition attained]###[Tradition]###[attained]
The police and the government could have taken many measures to reduce harm to parents and students
column2: but chose the easy way###3###HE_097###[Benevolence: dependability constrained]###[Benevolence: dependability]###[constrained]

column1: Classes in kindergartens and schools continued as usual
column2: even though hundreds of thousands of students were infected in the classrooms
column3: and tens of thousands of teachers could not come to teach due to illness or isolation.###5###HE_097###[Security: societal attained

column1: The message of the Minister of Education, Yifat Shasha-Biton, was "the easiest thing was to close the education system", and therefore the schools were instructed to remain open no matter what - even when there were no teachers in them and no classes were held in them, and even at the height of the epidemic, while students arrived without tests Corona.###6###HE_097###[Security: societal constrained]###[Security: societal]###[constrained]
This message remains valid despite an epidemic that threatens to collapse the hospitals.###7###HE_097###[Security: societal constrained]###[Security: societal]###[constrained]
The Ministry of Education hastened to inform the local authorities about the transition to distance learning
column2: since in any case the teaching staff cannot get to the schools because of the blocking of the roads.###9###HE_097###[Power: dominance attained]###[Power: dominance]###[attained]

column1: In addition
column2: for the first time since the first wave of the Corona virus
column3: the Ministry of Education approved the closing of the special education institutions
column4: which have remained open since May 2020.###11###HE_097###[Power: dominance attained]###[Power: dominance]###[attained]

column1: The ministry even approved stopping the transportation system for students in special education.###12###HE_097###[Power: dominance attained]###[Power: dominance]###[attained]
Even schools that continued to operate received permission to cancel trips and tests.###16###HE_097###[Conformity: rules attained]###[Conformity: rules]###[attained]
But in the morning
column2: it became clear that the roads to Tel Aviv and some of the settlements in the center were actually not blocked - so it was possible to hold classes in hundreds of kindergartens and schools
column3: and reduce the harm to students and parents.###17###HE_097###[Benevolence: dependability constrained]###[Benevolence: dependability]###[constrained]

column1: It seems that the Ministry of Education and the local authorities looked for and found a reason to cancel the studies.###18###HE_097###[Benevolence: dependability constrained]###[Benevolence: dependability]###[constrained]
It seems that the decision to close the education system in Gush Dan and the surrounding area was made too easily
column2: without appreciating the enormous damage to the students and their parents
column3: and especially to the special education students.###19###HE_097###[Benevolence: dependability constrained]###[Benevolence: dependability]###[constrained]

column1: It was possible
column2: for example
column3: to postpone the closing of the roads by an hour
column4: to allow the teaching staff to reach the kindergartens and schools
column5: since in any case the funeral was postponed to 12.###20###HE_097###[Self-direction: action constrained]###[Self-direction: action]###[constrained]

column1: Another option was to compensate teachers who would have been stuck in the central area after graduation due to the continuation of the blockades
column2: or to give a few hundred of them special permission to come to teach
column3: thus preventing the closure of at least some of the institutions.###21###HE_097###[Self-direction: action constrained]###[Self-direction: action]###[constrained]

column1: Alternatively
column2: it would be possible to organize convoys of buses from Jerusalem and the ultra-orthodox settlements in the center of Bnei Brak
column3: in order to reduce congestion and roadblocks.###22###HE_097###[Self-direction: action constrained]###[Self-direction: action]###[constrained]

column1: In general
column2: it seems that it was easier for the government ministries and the police to call on hundreds of thousands of students and parents not to come to the educational institutions
column3: workplaces and medical treatments in Gush Dan
column4: than to try and reduce the consequences of the road blocks.###23###HE_097###[Benevolence: dependability constrained]###[Benevolence: dependability]###[constrained]

column1: By the end of the day
column2: all the students of the center will learn not only who Rabbi Kanievsky was and how important he was to the ultra-orthodox public
column3: but also how easy it is to close their schools.###24###HE_097###[Tradition attained]###[Tradition]###[attained]

column1: What are the chances of getting cancer - and what are the chances of recovering from it?###1###HE_102###[Security: personal attained
column2: Security: personal constrained]###[Security: personal
column3: Security: personal]###[attained

column1: A cancer diagnosis was until a few years ago a death sentence
column2: but the field of medicine is developing
column3: and for many types of cancer there are already effective treatments
column4: and even tools that help prevent the disease.###2###HE_102###[Achievement attained

column1: On the occasion of Cancer Day, which is celebrated today (Friday), we invited Prof. Ido Wolf, director of the oncology department at the Ichilov Hospital, to the "Expert Clinic" studio, to ask what we must know about cancer today - and what the future holds for us.###3###HE_102###[Security: societal attained]###[Security: societal]###[attained]

"Oncology is considered a very tough field, many are not even able to say the words oncology or cancer, the newspaper always says 'severe diseases' or 'complex conditions'," said Prof. Wolff, "but in the end, cancer is another disease, in my opinion Not even the most difficult, there are more difficult things.###4###HE_102###[Security: societal attained
column2: Security: societal constrained]###[Security: societal
column3: Security: societal]###[attained

column1: I'm not sure that terrible dementia is easier than cancer."###5###HE_102###[Security: societal attained
column2: Security: societal constrained]###[Security: societal
column3: Security: societal]###[attained

column1: According to him, the most important thing to know about cancer is that "in recent years there has been a big change in the field of cancer treatment.###6###HE_102###[Security: societal attained]###[Security: societal]###[attained]

If it used to be a death sentence, if we look at Israel's statistics, the chance of getting cancer is decreasing, and the chance of recovery is increasing.###7###HE_102###[Security: societal attained]###[Security: societal]###[attained]
So the news is good."###8###HE_102###[Security: societal attained]###[Security: societal]###[attained]
Prof. Wolff also had an encouraging answer to the question about the price that cancer patients pay during complex treatments such as chemotherapy.###9###HE_102###[Security: societal attained
column2: Security: societal constrained]###[Security: societal
column3: Security: societal]###[attained

column1: "First of all, if we detect it early we will need less treatments," he explained, "and if we do need treatments - even here there are already big changes than there used to be."###10###HE_102###[Security: societal attained
column2: Security: societal constrained]###[Security: societal
column3: Security: societal]###[attained

column1: True, there is still chemotherapy, especially in breast cancer, where this is what causes hair loss and more side effects, but in other cancers we have been able to give much less harsh combinations, and in some cases we switch from chemotherapy treatments to all kinds of biological and immune treatments that are much easier for the patients, so in a sense we have successes".###11###HE_102###[Achievement attained]###[Achievement]###[attained]

Even in the more difficult cases, Prof. Wolf emphasizes, it is usually a very tough war of several months, "but we do this war to reach 120 later.###12###HE_102###[Achievement attained]###[Achievement]###[attained]

The advantage of today's treatments is that the vast majority of patients - we can cure them, and 120 is a realistic forecast, to recover from cancer.###13###HE_102###[Security: societal attained]###[Security: societal]###[attained]

So it's true, there will be some difficult months along the way, even very difficult, but the optimistic side is that if I have a 35 or 40-year-old patient with breast cancer, who in the past I would have known she would die of this cancer, today I know that after a few difficult months she will be able to live and have The family and the children, and even the grandchildren," he said.###14###HE_102###[Security: societal attained]###[Security: societal]###[attained]
One of the problems with cancer
column2: especially the metastatic and simple one
column3: is that it is sometimes difficult to find or locate it
column4: but also in this field there has been significant progress in recent years.###15###HE_102###[Achievement attained]###[Achievement]###[attained]

column1: "Today there are already blood tests that are developing in this direction, that can detect really tiny elements of the tumor in the blood, super super sensitive tests, that can detect even if there is a minimal disease," said Prof. Wolff, "It is currently in research, and I can assure you in 3- In 5 years we will use these tests routinely, and we will be able to know who has or does not have the small things and adjust treatment better.###16###HE_102###[Security: personal attained]###[Security: personal]###[attained]

And more than that, I assume that in 3-5 years we will test healthy people, and already with a blood test we will be able to detect the cancer."###17###HE_102###[Security: personal attained]###[Security: personal]###[attained]

More about cancer in Vala! Health: today we are not there yet, there are only regular screening tests that can be done to detect early cancer, "but in a few years, which is not long, each of us will go to the doctor and have a blood test done and look for the cancer at an early stage," explained Prof. Wolff .###18###HE_102###[Stimulation attained]###[Stimulation]###[attained]

He added that in England they have just started a study on exactly this test, they plan to test several hundreds of thousands of people, "so a study that is actually being carried out today will produce results in two, three, four years, and it is likely that in not many years each of us will go to the doctor once every few years "Give me a blood test and tell me if I have cancer."###19###HE_102###[Stimulation attained]###[Stimulation]###[attained]
He added that "the test already exists, it is in hand, I think that in 10 years our conversation will be completely different.###20###HE_102###[Stimulation attained]###[Stimulation]###[attained]

"When someone has cancer, they try to find the cause, it's natural, and many times the cause of cancer is attributed to all kinds of events that have happened to us, of all kinds and species."###22###HE_102###[Self-direction: action attained]###[Self-direction: action]###[attained]
This understanding
column2: of course
column3: should not harm optimism
column4: since as Prof. Wolf made clear the chance of getting cancer decreases
column5: and the chance of recovery increases
column6: but it is important to be able to deal with this diagnosis

The incoming head of the Mossad: Iran is working to realize the nuclear vision under the cover of international protection###1###HE_114###[Power: dominance attained]###[Power: dominance]###[attained]

The head of the new Mossad, David Barnea, said today (Tuesday) that "Iran is working, even at this very moment, to realize its nuclear vision, under the cover of international protection.###2###HE_114###[Power: dominance attained]###[Power: dominance]###[attained]

Under the auspices of the agreement and without it, with lies and concealments, Iran is in constant progress towards a program to produce weapons of mass destruction."###3###HE_114###[Power: dominance attained]###[Power: dominance]###[attained]

Barnea added at his inauguration ceremony that "our security challenges are very big, and at the top of the list is Iran."###4###HE_114###[Security: societal constrained]###[Security: societal]###[constrained]

Prime Minister Binyamin Netanyahu spoke at the Mossad head exchange ceremony, with the appointment of Barnea as Yossi Cohen's replacement, and claimed that the Iranian nuclear project is an existential threat, the "greatest" for the State of Israel.###5###HE_114###[Security: societal constrained]###[Security: societal]###[constrained]

"Whether to threaten us directly with the destruction of a small and concentrated country with nuclear weapons, or whether to threaten us with tens of thousands of missiles or thousands of missiles backed by a nuclear umbrella.###6###HE_114###[Security: societal constrained]###[Security: societal]###[constrained]

It is a threat that threatens the continuation of the Zionist enterprise, and we must fight this threat endlessly," he emphasized.###7###HE_114###[Security: societal attained]###[Security: societal]###[attained]
He congratulated the intelligence agency for its fight against the issue
column2: and made it clear that Israel will continue to fight this as long as necessary.###8###HE_114###[Security: societal attained]###[Security: societal]###[attained]

column1: "You are doing it, we talked yesterday about actions that were taken and these actions must continue.###9###HE_114###[Security: societal attained]###[Security: societal]###[attained]

I said these things to my friend of 40 years, Joe Biden, and I told him: 'With or without an agreement, we will continue to do everything in our power to thwart Iran's arming itself with nuclear weapons.'###10###HE_114###[Power: dominance attained]###[Power: dominance]###[attained]
Because Iran is different from the other countries that have nuclear weapons today.###11###HE_114###[Power: dominance attained]###[Power: dominance]###[attained]
That's why marriage is not an option."###12###HE_114###[Power: dominance attained]###[Power: dominance]###[attained]
Finally
column2: Netanyahu clarified that Israel will not hesitate to confront the White House on the issue.###13###HE_114###[Power: dominance attained]###[Power: dominance]###[attained]

column1: "If we have to choose, I hope it won't happen, between friction with our great friend the United States and the elimination of the existential threat - the elimination of the existential threat is increasing," Netanyahu said.###14###HE_114###[Power: dominance attained]###[Power: dominance]###[attained]

"This falls first of all on you, on the political leadership of the State of Israel, and on you Dadi - you have to do everything, but everything, to ensure that under no circumstances will Iran arm itself with nuclear weapons."###15###HE_114###[Security: societal attained]###[Security: societal]###[attained]

Netanyahu attacked the law limiting the priesthood: "Gideon, take down the Vasach"; Saar: "He lives in the movie"###1###HE_115###[Power: dominance attained]###[Power: dominance]###[attained]

The chairman of the opposition MK Benjamin Netanyahu (Likud) today (Monday) at the meeting of the Likud faction attacked the bill to limit the term of the prime minister that was approved by the ministerial committee for legislation
column2: and the bill that prevents a person accused of crimes from forming the government.###2###HE_115###[Power: dominance attained
column3: Conformity: rules attained]###[Power: dominance

column1: Netanyahu called the proposals "Iranian and Syrian laws", and accused the coalition leaders of violating the will of the public.###3###HE_115###[Power: dominance attained]###[Power: dominance]###[attained]
The Minister of Justice responded to the comments by saying that Netanyahu "lives in a movie".###4###HE_115###[Face constrained]###[Face]###[constrained]

"They are trying to pass an Iranian law that should actually lead to a situation where those who can win the elections will not win the elections," Netanyahu accused, "but there is a problem with passing an Iranian law because what endangers them is that the will of the public will be expressed.###5###HE_115###[Power: dominance constrained]###[Power: dominance]###[constrained]

This law is too blatant so they start with a preliminary law - a term limit law that does not exist in any parliamentary democracy.###6###HE_115###[Conformity: rules constrained]###[Conformity: rules]###[constrained]

In a democracy, the public decides who will lead it, not an arbitrary law that will transfer power to officials or politicians."###7###HE_115###[Universalism: concern constrained]###[Universalism: concern]###[constrained]
"It won't help them.###8###HE_115###[Power: dominance attained]###[Power: dominance]###[attained]
The public cannot be stopped.###9###HE_115###[Power: dominance attained]###[Power: dominance]###[attained]

We will win, we will take all these laws and throw them in the trash, and we will return the will of the people to the people," Netanyahu continued.###10###HE_115###[Power: dominance attained]###[Power: dominance]###[attained]

Justice Minister Gideon Sa'ar responded to the remarks at the beginning of a new Hope faction yeshiva, and welcomed the approval of the law by the Ministerial Committee for Legislation.###11###HE_115###[Achievement attained]###[Achievement]###[attained]

Precedent PSAD: A controlling owner can purchase the shares of the public company under his control at the market price only###1###HE_160###[Power: resources attained]###[Power: resources]###[attained]
When a controlling owner purchases the shares of the public company under his control
column2: two major problems arise: the conflict of interest and the price.###2###HE_160###[Power: resources attained]###[Power: resources]###[attained]

column1: This week
column2: the judge of the Central District Court
column3: Benny Arnon
column4: dismissed a derivative suit against the controlling owner and officers of the Optibase real estate company.###3###HE_160###[Conformity: rules attained]###[Conformity: rules]###[attained]

column1: Arnon
column2: in a comprehensive 130-page ruling
column3: ruled in favor of the company regarding three private allocations it made to its controlling owner

column1: According to the plaintiffs
column2: the shareholders Simcha and Baruria Shiloni
column3: the allocations were made with a conflict of interest of the controlling owner who was on both sides of the transaction
column4: and at prices lower than the fair and proper value of the stock on each of these dates.###5###HE_160###[Power: resources attained

column1: The price question is the central message in the story.###6###HE_160###[Power: resources attained
column2: Power: resources constrained]###[Power: resources
column3: Power: resources]###[attained

column1: In situations where the controlling owner wishes to purchase its shares in order to disappear from the stock market and turn a public company into a private one
column2: strict conditions have been imposed on the board
column3: due to the fear of improper manipulation.###7###HE_160###[Conformity: rules attained]###[Conformity: rules]###[attained]

column1: For example
column2: if the controlling owner knows about an imminent exit and therefore has an interest in keeping the public away from the expected profits.###8###HE_160###[Power: resources attained]###[Power: resources]###[attained]

column1: Therefore, in the case of 'going private' (turning a company from public to private), the controlling owner is obliged to make a "full tender offer" and the price will be determined according to the DCF method - future cash flow - which embodies the future valuation of the company.###9###HE_160###[Power: resources attained
column2: Power: resources constrained]###[Power: resources
column3: Power: resources]###[attained

column1: Arnon stated in the current case that in the absence of suspicion of manipulation
column2: the price will be the market value of the share only.###10###HE_160###[Face attained]###[Face]###[attained]

column1: This, after he was convinced of the legitimacy of the reasons for the allocation - the company's need for cash, by way of selling shares to the controlling owner who pours money into it in exchange for shares.###11###HE_160###[Power: resources attained
column2: Face attained]###[Power: resources
column3: Face]###[attained

column1: "Different from a full tender offer," Arnon wrote, "a private share allocation makes it possible to examine the stock's behavior in the market after the shares are allocated, and accordingly to identify whether the allocation was made at a price that does not reflect the fair value of the share, including due to the use of insider information or due to the choice of timing manipulative to make the allocation by the controlling owner".###12###HE_160###[Power: resources attained
column2: Power: resources constrained]###[Power: resources
column3: Power: resources]###[attained

column1: That is
column2: if the controlling owner Weiler will later profit from the shares he purchased in the allotment
column3: the rest of the stockholders will also profit as well.###13###HE_160###[Power: resources attained]###[Power: resources]###[attained]

column1: So it's debatable whether Weiler acted to save the company or took advantage of a business opportunity.###14###HE_160###[Power: resources attained
column2: Power: resources constrained]###[Power: resources
column3: Power: resources]###[attained

column1: But
column2: even if he survives
column3: all shareholders will benefit - unlike in the case where the company was delisted.###15###HE_160###[Power: resources attained

column1: The plaintiffs claimed that the company did not examine alternative ways of raising funds
column2: such as loans for example or issuing shares to the public.###16###HE_160###[Power: resources constrained]###[Power: resources]###[constrained]

column1: In this matter, the judge ruled in favor of the company, when he applied the 'business judgment' rule.###17###HE_160###[Conformity: rules attained]###[Conformity: rules]###[attained]
In dealing with the claim of conflict of interest raised by the plaintiffs
column2: Arnon stated that the decision passed the triple approval required for transactions involving interested parties - the approval of the audit committee
column3: the board of directors and the general meeting
column4: with a large majority of untainted shareholders.###18###HE_160###[Conformity: rules attained]###[Conformity: rules]###[attained]

column1: So the judge applied the essentially procedural rule
column2: which immunizes the officers from lawsuits if they acted in good faith
column3: in the absence of a conflict of interest and in an informed manner
column5: they reviewed and considered the deal.###19###HE_160###[Conformity: rules attained]###[Conformity: rules]###[attained]

column1: The plaintiffs argued that the stricter test should be applied because it is a transaction in which the controlling owner stands on both sides.###20###HE_160###[Conformity: rules attained]###[Conformity: rules]###[attained]
This is the "rule of complete fairness" test, which was applied by Judge Dania Keret Meir in the Makhteshim Agan deal.###21###HE_160###[Conformity: rules attained]###[Conformity: rules]###[attained]

A rule that checks the fairness of the transaction itself, and not just its procedural cleanliness, as required by the "business judgment rule" test.###22###HE_160###[Conformity: rules attained]###[Conformity: rules]###[attained]
Arnon rejected the demand to apply the strict rule.###23###HE_160###[Conformity: rules attained]###[Conformity: rules]###[attained]

In his opinion, it should be applied "only when the transaction shows suspicious signs such as a noticeable inequality between the controlling owner and the other shareholders".###24###HE_160###[Power: resources attained
column2: Power: resources constrained]###[Power: resources
column3: Power: resources]###[attained

column1: Arnon stated that "the decision to raise capital for the company was a reasonable and logical decision under the circumstances."###25###HE_160###[Self-direction: action attained]###[Self-direction: action]###[attained]

The bottom line, summarizes attorney Sharon Lubetzky Hess of Amit Polk Matlon, who represented some of the officers, is that "in the absence of fear of manipulation of the share price, a public company can make a private allocation to its controlling owner at the market price, without being required to carry out a valuation of its shares .###26###HE_160###[Power: resources attained]###[Power: resources]###[attained]

In this way, the verdict contributes to creating certainty, which did not exist until now, regarding the proper pricing of the company's shares for the purpose of carrying out a private allocation, which as a rule is a faster and cheaper option for raising capital for the company, certainly in relation to the issue of shares to the public, which requires the publication of a prospectus and additional costs on the side.###27###HE_160###[Power: resources attained
column2: Security: societal attained]###[Power: resources
column3: Security: societal]###[attained

column1: Colorectal cancer: the new liquid biopsy that avoids unnecessary treatments###1###IT_219###[Security: societal attained]###[Security: societal]###[attained]
This is shown by the Italian Chronos study
column2: coordinated by the Candiolo Institute IRCCS Fondazione del Piemonte per l'Oncologia (FPO) - IRCCS and Niguarda Hospital in Milan
column3: with the collaboration of the University of Turin and the University of Milan and the clinical participation of the National Cancer Institute in Milan and the Veneto Oncology Institute in Padua.###3###IT_219###[Stimulation attained]###[Stimulation]###[attained]

column1: For the first time
column2: researchers have used this technique as a measurement tool to figure out the right time to administer a second course of molecular-targeted therapy to patients with colorectal metastases.The work
column3: just published in Nature Medicine
column4: showed that real-time monitoring of tumor progress
column5: through analysis of circulating tumor DNA
column6: allows patients with gene mutations to be identified
column7: avoiding a second course of treatment that may be unnecessary.###4###IT_219###[Stimulation attained

column1: In short: choosing the right therapy
column2: for the right patient
column3: at the right time.###6###IT_219###[Security: personal attained]###[Security: personal]###[attained]

column1: Fundamental funding from Piedmont Foundation for Oncology IRCCS Candiolo IRCCS in the context of an AIRC 5x1000 research grant.###7###IT_219###[Power: resources attained]###[Power: resources]###[attained]

"In patients with metastatic colorectal cancer, many molecularly targeted therapies are based on monoclonal antibodies against EGFR growth receptors, which can only be used in patients without mutations in RAS/BRAF," explains Professor Alberto Bardelli, co-author of the study from the IRCCS Candiolo Department of Oncology and professor at the University of Turin. "Although the therapy is effective, most patients undergoing this treatment can develop drug resistance over time and the disease progresses.###8###IT_219###[Security: personal constrained]###[Security: personal]###[constrained]
The difficulty, however, lies in figuring out when to start a second cycle."###10###IT_219###[Security: personal constrained]###[Security: personal]###[constrained]
Until now
column2: it was not possible to determine this except empirically
column3: based on a statistical time interval elapsed since previous therapy.###11###IT_219###[Security: personal constrained]###[Security: personal]###[constrained]

column1: This is the context for the Chronos study
column2: which
column3: for the first time
column4: exploits the potential of liquid biopsy to monitor tumor progress in real time and guide therapy
column5: allowing it to be excluded in patients with mutated genes in whom treatment would not work.###12###IT_219###[Stimulation attained]###[Stimulation]###[attained]

column1: "Thanks to liquid biopsy among patients without mutations who were enrolled in the study, 30 percent showed an objective response," adds Bardelli: a higher value than observed by selecting patients according to clinical criteria only.###15###IT_219###[Achievement attained]###[Achievement]###[attained]

"Overall," Bardelli concludes, "this clinical trial represents the first integration of liquid biopsy to the treatment pathway in a big killer cancer such as colorectal cancer.###20###IT_219###[Security: personal attained]###[Security: personal]###[attained]
Having a diagnostic tool that rules out surely ineffective treatments saves unnecessary toxicity and suffering."###22###IT_219###[Benevolence: caring attained]###[Benevolence: caring]###[attained]

column1: Those who are not exempt were explained as follows; "In the 'Workplaces, Businesses and Institutions to be Open' in the heading (2) of this circular, the managers, officers or employees, employees of the Turkish Grand National Assembly, those who are in charge of ensuring public order and security, employees of emergency call centers, those who will perform and participate in the funeral burial procedures of their first-degree relatives, electricity, water, natural gas, telecommunications, etc. Those who are in charge of maintaining supply systems that should not be interrupted and eliminating their malfunctions, those in charge of domestic and international transportation in the transportation and logistics of products and/or materials, those in charge of newspapers, radio and television organizations, employees of social protection/care centers such as elderly nursing homes, nursing homes, rehabilitation centers, children's homes, etc., employees of PTT, cargo and water distribution companies, iron and steel and glass sector, etc. Those who work in the harvesting of agricultural and livestock products that are at risk of spoilage in workplaces operating in sectors such as iron and steel and glass sectors, bakeries, cold storages, vehicles and employees in charge of the distribution of bread produced in bakeries, those who have an appointment for blood and plasma donation in coordination with the Red Crescent." The circular stated that travel permits issued for health and funerals within the scope of previous circulars will be valid on Monday (except for those on the road), "I strongly request and kindly request that the necessary decisions be taken urgently by the governors / district governors in accordance with the relevant legislation regarding the above-mentioned measures, that no disruptions be caused in practice and no victimization be caused, that the citizens who do not comply with the decisions taken be subjected to administrative fines in accordance with Article 282 of the Public Hygiene Law, and that the necessary judicial proceedings be initiated within the scope of Article 195 of the Turkish Penal Code regarding the criminal behavior."###8###TR_092###[Power: dominance attained

By comparison
column2: there have been oceans on Earth for almost four billion years.###6###DE_174###[]###[]###[]

column1: A team led by astrophysicist Martin Turbet from the University of Geneva has now added another piece to the puzzle in the journal "Nature".###8###DE_174###[]###[]###[]

"We simulated the climate of Earth and Venus at the very beginning of their evolution, more than four billion years ago, when the surfaces of the planets were still molten," Turbet is quoted as saying in a press release from the University of Geneva.###9###DE_174###[]###[]###[]
At that time
column2: the celestial bodies resembled a gigantic pressure cooker.###10###DE_174###[]###[]###[]

column1: And according to the researchers
column2: the temperatures on Venus were never low enough for the water vapor in the atmosphere to condense and pour down on the planet in the form of rain.###11###DE_174###[]###[]###[]

column1: This is because clouds
column2: which preferentially formed on the night side of the planet
column3: created an enormous greenhouse effect that prevented Venus from cooling down sufficiently - and thus the formation of oceans.###12###DE_174###[]###[]###[]

column1: The observations obtained will be crucial "to confirm - or refute - our work," said Geneva professor and co-author of the study, David Ehrenreich.###15###DE_174###[]###[]###[]
"If the authors are correct, Venus has always been a hellhole," write US researchers James Kasting and Chester Harman in an article accompanying the study.###16###DE_174###[]###[]###[]

column2: it would now be just as inhospitable a planet as Venus.###19###DE_174###[]###[]###[]

column1: Macron faces fresh challenge as massive strike looms in France###1###EN_095###[]###[]###[]

It is the latest expression of discontent by broad swathes of French society, from police and firefighters to teachers and hospital employees -- as well as a yearlong "yellow vest" movement demanding improved living standards.###4###EN_095###[]###[]###[]
Looming over the reform is the spectre of 1995
column2: the last major attempt to change the pension system when weeks of strikes paralysed the country and forced the government to back down.###5###EN_095###[]###[]###[]

column1: Bike shops have been inundated with rental requests
column2: ride-hailing services are planning to add drivers and electric scooter operators are offering special deals to help commuters cope with the expected traffic jams. - 'Provocation' - So far
column3: Macron has been able to ride out opposition to previous signature reforms
column4: including less-restrictive labour laws and tax cuts to encourage hiring and overhauls of the education system.###7###EN_095###[]###[]###[]

column1: He even pushed through changes to the state-run rail operator SNCF
column2: long considered an untouchable union bastion
column3: ending job-for-life guarantees and other benefits for new employees.###8###EN_095###[]###[]###[]

column1: Those successes have only fired up union leaders, who have vowed to maintain their strike until Macron abandons his campaign promise for a "universal" retirement system.###9###EN_095###[]###[]###[]

It would do away with 42 "special regimes" for sectors ranging from rail and energy workers to lawyers and Paris Opera employees, which often grant workers higher pensions or early retirement.###10###EN_095###[]###[]###[]

But unions say the changes would effectively require millions of private-sector workers to work beyond the legal retirement age of 62 if they want to receive the full pension they have been promised.###11###EN_095###[]###[]###[]
"The flagrant provocation is trying to say this reform would affect only the special schemes," Philippe Martinez of the hard-line CGT union said last week.###12###EN_095###[]###[]###[]
"It's a shameful lie," he continued.###13###EN_095###[]###[]###[]

"Everyone understands that it's a reform that will affect the public as well as the private sector." - 'Quite harmful' - Prime Minister Edouard Philippe has acknowledged that French workers will gradually work longer but no concrete details of the overhaul are to be announced before mid-December.###14###EN_095###[]###[]###[]
Police unions
column2: rubbish collectors
column3: air-traffic controllers and Air France workers have said they will start striking on Thursday
column4: and the biggest union for primary school teachers expects four out of 10 schools will remain shut.###16###EN_095###[]###[]###[]

column1: released on Friday showed
column2: in the second quarter of 2021
column3: the average monthly gross wages and salaries were �1
column5: which is 7.3 percent higher than the year before.###3###EN_262###[]###[]###[]

column1: "The increase in working hours per employee contributed to the acceleration of wage growth and wages grew faster in private companies than in the public sector.###4###EN_262###[]###[]###[]
Taking into account seasonal factors, the average salary increased by 0.5 percent compared to the previous quarter," Soosaar said .###5###EN_262###[]###[]###[]
She said salary growth would have been even faster if the share of employees by different fields of activity had remained the same as last year.###6###EN_262###[]###[]###[]

"The recovery in the number of jobs in lower-than-average-wage activities, such as accommodation and food service activities, is somewhat holding back the increase in average wages," she said.###7###EN_262###[]###[]###[]
"Economic growth has accelerated this year, but companies have recruited fewer employees than expected for this.###8###EN_262###[]###[]###[]
Thus, labor productivity has increased, which provides an opportunity to raise wages," the economist said.###9###EN_262###[]###[]###[]
The share of companies that perceive labor shortages as a significant problem also increased," she added.###11###EN_262###[]###[]###[]

column1: I only want to indicate here what can be recommended based on my clinical experience.###12###NL_025###[]###[]###[]

column1: It is not about treating an eating disorder

column1: Until she was 11

column1: That employee then received the necessary guidance and advice from the team.###34###NL_025###[]###[]###[]

column1: Background: the battle for automotive data###2###NL_028###[]###[]###[]
Have you ever considered that most modern cars capture all kinds of data?###3###NL_028###[]###[]###[]
Cars that are connected can even send that data.###4###NL_028###[]###[]###[]
That's all the data generated when you move from A to B.###9###NL_028###[]###[]###[]
That can be by car or by public transportation, but we focus on the "travel data" produced when you drive a car.###10###NL_028###[]###[]###[]
With all the electronic safety systems and information technology used
column2: you could say a car is something like a brain.###11###NL_028###[]###[]###[]

column1: That brain tracks exactly what the car is doing and also records where the car is and at what time.###12###NL_028###[]###[]###[]
All that information can be traced back to your car's license plate and VIN number
column2: and therefore it is personal information.###13###NL_028###[]###[]###[]

column1: Moreover
column2: your car also records information that is about you personally
column3: such as your driving style.###14###NL_028###[]###[]###[]

column1: The various systems in your car are all linked together
column2: so the brain in your car not only perceives that you are driving 100 km/h
column3: it also sees (thanks to traffic sign recognition) that you are doing so on an 80 km/h road in the dark (lights are on)
column4: while it is raining (windshield wipers are on).###15###NL_028###[]###[]###[]

column1: Moreover
column2: in many cases
column3: your car connects with your smartphone or tablet and can communicate with its surroundings
column4: such as other cars or roadside systems.###16###NL_028###[]###[]###[]

column1: If you were to combine all that data endlessly
column2: it would create a mountain of data about you and your car.###17###NL_028###[]###[]###[]

column1: Cars that are connected thus send their data periodically.###18###NL_028###[]###[]###[]

"That usually ends up in a server at the car manufacturer's premises and they decide what happens to that data, who is allowed to use it and under what conditions," explained Leo Bingen, Smart Mobility & ITS consultant at the RAI Association.###19###NL_028###[]###[]###[]
This discussion is still ongoing."###21###NL_028###[]###[]###[]
It should be a stand-alone contract.###23###NL_028###[]###[]###[]
Not only with new cars
column2: but also when buying a used car
column3: you as a consumer should again be able to decide where the data from your car goes.###24###NL_028###[]###[]###[]

column1: Making mortgage repayments was unnecessary for now
column2: and interest payments were suspended
column3: banks reported in mid-March.###5###NL_102###[]###[]###[]

column1: "Banks are now part of the solution, not the problem," ABN Amro chief Kees van Dijkhuizen outlined the setup, citing the 2008 financial crisis.###6###NL_102###[]###[]###[]
What exactly does this payment break look like?###7###NL_102###[]###[]###[]
And to whom does it apply?###8###NL_102###[]###[]###[]
The answer to that question depends on the mortgage lender.###10###NL_102###[]###[]###[]

Almost all have now rigged "corona schemes" for customers in financial trouble: from ABN Amro, ING and Rabobank to insurers like Aegon and new players like Munt Hypotheken and Florius.###11###NL_102###[]###[]###[]
The payment break at ABN Amro
column2: for example
column3: applies by default for three months and (because of the rush due to the number of applications) may not take effect until June 1.###14###NL_102###[]###[]###[]

column1: ING, on the other hand, immediately suspends mortgage payments and uses "a term by mutual agreement," instead of three months.###15###NL_102###[]###[]###[]
Approaches to making up for missed mortgage payments also differ among mortgage lenders.###16###NL_102###[]###[]###[]

At ABN Amro, the three missed months of interest and redemption are spread out over the period to Dec. 31, 2021, while Rabobank merely states, "we'll make arrangements about that later."###17###NL_102###[]###[]###[]
The three largest banks do not charge additional fees for the missed months
Mortgage payments must still be paid
column2: but there is no additional cost to take advantage of the scheme.###19###NL_102###[]###[]###[]

column1: Thus, the "late payment interest," which is normally charged when a mortgagee falls behind on repayment, does not apply.###20###NL_102###[]###[]###[]
The contrast with Belgium
column2: which also has a pay break

column1: The Belgian pause came about after consultations between the central bank
column2: the finance ministry and the banking umbrella.###22###NL_102###[]###[]###[]

column1: As a result
column2: a uniform maximum six-month payment break will apply to consumers who have no more than 25
column3: 000 euros in their savings accounts.###23###NL_102###[]###[]###[]

column1: ABN Amro
column2: Rabobank and ING have no such financial buffer limit
column3: they said when asked.###24###NL_102###[]###[]###[]

column1: ING stresses that customers should contact it and "not wait until their buffer is completely gone."###25###NL_102###[]###[]###[]
ABN Amro says it is discussing with customers "whether a payment break is the best solution."###26###NL_102###[]###[]###[]
"If there is (a lot of) savings present, it is obvious that the customer will use it first."###27###NL_102###[]###[]###[]
Dutch banks' criteria "are rather vague," notes attorney Thomas van Vugt of AMS Lawyers.###28###NL_102###[]###[]###[]
Above all
column2: the key question remains unclear: when are your financial problems serious enough to qualify for the break?###29###NL_102###[]###[]###[]

column1: Van Vugt points out that although the payment break is a gesture by the bank
column2: this does not mean that the bank may use it arbitrarily.###30###NL_102###[]###[]###[]

column1: The banks decided to make the offer
column2: and that brings with it certain responsibilities and a duty of care.###31###NL_102###[]###[]###[]

column1: "If people substantiate that they have financial problems or foresee them as a result of the coronavirus, then as a bank you cannot simply say that someone is not entitled to the payment break.###32###NL_102###[]###[]###[]
When in doubt, the decision should be in favor of the customer."###33###NL_102###[]###[]###[]

column2: there is no uniform rule for who gets a payment break on their mortgage and for how long it applies.###35###NL_102###[]###[]###[]

column1: The pay break is a gesture and not a right.###36###NL_102###[]###[]###[]

column1: The Investment Bank - and to a lesser extent the Commission - issue such debt for all 27 member states

column1: Those three institutions have been issuing so-called mutualized debt securities

In his statement on June 21
column2: World ALS Day
column3: Okan Delikan gave information about ALS disease and diagnosis.###4###TR_026###[]###[]###[]

column1: WHAT IS ALS
column2: MOTOR NEURON DISEASE?###5###TR_026###[]###[]###[]

column1: Stating that ALS (Amyotrophic Lateral Sclerosis) and Motor Neuron Disease are generally used in the same sense in the world
Okan Delikan said, "The 2 groups of nerve cells of the system that makes voluntary movements (pyramidal system) are called motorneurons.###8###TR_026###[]###[]###[]
The nerve cells from the cerebral cortex to the spinal cord are called first motor neurons (upper motor neurons).###9###TR_026###[]###[]###[]
The electrical impulses generated in the motor center of our brain are transmitted to the spinal cord by a nerve cell called the 1st motor neuron (alpha motor neuron).###10###TR_026###[]###[]###[]

The second motor neuron (lower motor neuron) starts in the region of the spinal cord called the anterior horn. The passage of electrical impulses between the 1st and 2nd motor neuron takes place through chemical processes in a space called the synapse.###11###TR_026###[]###[]###[]
The electrical impulse transmitted from the synapse gap to the 2nd motor neuron is transmitted from the spinal cord to the relevant muscle area.###12###TR_026###[]###[]###[]
With this electrical impulse
Diseases affecting the first and/or second motor neuron are generally referred to as Motor Neuron Disease.###14###TR_026###[]###[]###[]
ALS is just one of the diseases that affect these nerves.###15###TR_026###[]###[]###[]

Many factors such as certain environmental factors such as pesticides and heavy metals, hormonal disorders, vitamin deficiency, viruses, cancer have been suspected to cause the disease, but there has not been enough evidence for any of them."###17###TR_026###[]###[]###[]
Uzm. Dr. Okan Delikan gave the following information about ALS: WHO CAN GET ALS?###18###TR_026###[]###[]###[]
ALS is not a contagious disease; it can occur anywhere in the world and in people from all walks of life.###19###TR_026###[]###[]###[]
It is slightly more common in men.###20###TR_026###[]###[]###[]
The average age of onset is 55 years.###21###TR_026###[]###[]###[]
However
column2: it can occur at a very young age or at a very advanced age.###22###TR_026###[]###[]###[]

column1: About 2-6 per 100
column2: 000 of the population has ALS.###23###TR_026###[]###[]###[]

column1: WHAT ARE THE SYMPTOMS?###24###TR_026###[]###[]###[]
Symptoms are not the same in every patient.###25###TR_026###[]###[]###[]
Usually
column2: weakness or thinning in one arm or leg is the first symptom the patient notices.###26###TR_026###[]###[]###[]

column1: For example, it becomes difficult to hold a pen, button a button, carry a bag; or the patient stumbles when walking.###27###TR_026###[]###[]###[]
In some patients

column1: The patient or relatives notice a lisp or nasal speech.###29###TR_026###[]###[]###[]
These symptoms may be accompanied by muscle twitching
There may be uncontrollable crying and laughing.###31###TR_026###[]###[]###[]
WHAT ARE THE RISK FACTORS FOR ALS?###32###TR_026###[]###[]###[]
Of all ALS patients
column2: 90% are sporadic (individual) and 10% are familial ALS patients.###33###TR_026###[]###[]###[]

column1: Half of familial ALS patients are also inherited.###34###TR_026###[]###[]###[]
It can therefore be said that the disease is largely unrelated to heredity.###35###TR_026###[]###[]###[]
Another characteristic of ALS patients is that they fit a certain personality profile.###36###TR_026###[]###[]###[]
Some epidemiologic data suggest an association between overexertion or certain chemicals and this disease
column2: but there is no definitive proof.###38###TR_026###[]###[]###[]

column1: ARE THERE STAGES OF THE DISEASE?###40###TR_026###[]###[]###[]
Over time
column2: the weakness spreads from where it started to other areas
column3: such as the muscles of the arms

column1: He cannot eat
He may not even get out of bed.###45###TR_026###[]###[]###[]
The critical period of the disease is when the respiratory muscles also weaken.###46###TR_026###[]###[]###[]
The course of ALS is different for each patient.###48###TR_026###[]###[]###[]
Although survival is usually given as 4-6 years
column2: there are many patients who live 10 years or more.###49###TR_026###[]###[]###[]

column1: There are ALS patients who live more than 20 years with good medical and social support.###50###TR_026###[]###[]###[]
The reason for this difference is not fully known.###51###TR_026###[]###[]###[]
HOW IS THE DIAGNOSIS MADE?###52###TR_026###[]###[]###[]
Diagnosis is based on clinical signs and symptoms.###53###TR_026###[]###[]###[]
Nevertheless
column2: the disease can be confused with many muscle and nerve diseases
column3: so some tests are necessary.###54###TR_026###[]###[]###[]

column1: An electromyogram (EMG) performed by an experienced electroneurophysiologist is the diagnostic tool.###55###TR_026###[]###[]###[]
Magnetic resonance imaging (MRI) of the brain and spinal cord
column2: some blood and urine tests
column3: lumbar puncture (examination of lumbar fluid)
column5: as they may be confused with other diseases.###56###TR_026###[]###[]###[]

column1: WHICH SYMPTOMS SHOULD BE TAKEN INTO ACCOUNT?###57###TR_026###[]###[]###[]

The physician checks for distinctive neuronal signs including; muscle atrophy (loss of muscle volume), muscle weakness, twitching, increased muscle tone, changes in normal muscle reflexes.###58###TR_026###[]###[]###[]
If the neurologist finds signs of motor neurons in at least three parts of the patient's body
column2: a definitive diagnosis of MNH can be made.###59###TR_026###[]###[]###[]

column1: IS THERE A CURE FOR THE DISEASE?###60###TR_026###[]###[]###[]
Special medication for ALS patients is used to reduce the amount of glutamate in the body
column2: thus slowing the progression of the disease.###63###TR_026###[]###[]###[]

column1: Today
column2: there are many possibilities for rehabilitation of the patient.###66###TR_026###[]###[]###[]

column1: These are determined according to the needs of each patient.###67###TR_026###[]###[]###[]

Drug treatments for muscle pain, cramps and muscle stiffness (spasticity), treatment with a psychiatric approach to patients and their relatives for changes in emotional state, treatment of speech problems with a speech therapist, medication for increased salivation and swallowing problems or tube feeding treatment called PEG, pain treatment, tracheotomy or connection to a respirator for the treatment of respiratory problems."###68###TR_026###[]###[]###[]

column1: Does your transformation journey support this?###19###TR_241###[]###[]###[]

This is exactly what you say afterwards, "I was very upset at the time, but now when I look at it, I understand, now I realize why."###25###TR_241###[]###[]###[]
That's why transcending karma is both easy in one way and difficult in another.###28###TR_241###[]###[]###[]
